an9.40:2.3: khādanti → khāditaṁ (sya-all, mr) | ogāhā ca → ogāhaṁ (bj); ogāhāpi ca (sya-all, mr); ogāhañca (pts1ed)
an9.40:2.5: obhaggobhaggañcassa sākhābhaṅgaṁ na khādanti → na obhaggobhaggañca sākhābhaṅgaṁ khādati (sya-all, mr)
an9.40:3.2: ogāhā → ettha pisaddo sabbatthapi, parimajjitvā → parimadditvā (bj, pts1ed) | soṇḍaṁ saṁharati → kaṇḍuṁ saṁhanti (bj, pts1ed); kaṇḍuṁ saṁhanati (sya-all)
an9.40:5.8: soṇḍaṁ saṁharati → kaṇḍuṁ saṁhanti (bj, pts1ed); kaṇḍuṁ saṁhanati (sya-all)
